fields.headline: New Media Age
fields.bodyText: The dramatic increase in online paedophile activity has stretched the resources of industry body the Internet Watch Foundation to near breaking point, according to its newly appointed chief executive. Mobile phone operator O2 is on the verge of launching a new brand, Revolution, which will compete with i-mode for domination of the mobile data market. Sky has launched a dedicated betting and gaming portal within its interactive services. New BBC radio station 1xtra hopes to be first the digital radio station to offer full interactivity for its broadcasts on digital TV. Freeserve is making its first move into the growing betting comparison sector by offering an odds comparison service via Betgenius. The Lancashire-based online sports group Footymad.net has clinched a five-figure deal with the administrators of Sports.com to take control of its online development arm. Online gaming firm Cashcade is on the verge of securing six-figure funding and is in talks with several media owners about launching online casinos and web-based bingo. The UK's first interactive soft porn channel will appear this autumn, when adult channel Pout goes live on Sky in November. The site of the week is HardRockCasino.com, which scores 84 out of 100.
